A very simple app that turns your screen on for a specified period time when you get a notification. If your device is in your pocket or the proximity sensor is otherwise covered, the screen will not turn on.
Any ideas or feature requests are welcome, please email me with them.
If you would like to translate this app, please visit the following link: https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/screen-notifications/
If you have issues or enhancements, fork me on github: https://github.com/lkorth/screen-notifications
Defines in seconds how long the sensors should listen for movement or proximity to wake up device. Higher values will use a little bit more battery
A lower value will wake up the device more easily when it moves, higher values will make it wake up only when it is moved more (default=2)
